word: MRS. HENRY CONTINUED WITH THE ORGANIZATION, AND IT WAS LARGELY DUE TO THE INFLUENCE OF HER WORK AND HER APPEALS THAT THE WORK IN BEHALF OFTHE SUNDAY LAW WAS QUITE GENERALLY DROPPED BY THAT ORGANIZATION. HER WORK, BOTH FOR THE LADIES OF THIS ORGANIZATION AND FOR THE WOMEN OF THE DENOMINATION PROVED A GREAT BLESSING UNTIL HER UNTIMELY DEATH IN JANUARY, 1900. MANY WORDS OF ENCOURAGEMENT WERE WRITTEN TO HER BY MRS. WHITE, SUCH AS THE FOLLOWING]:
